verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold, What Manner Of Love! What Manner Of Love The Father Hath Bestowed Upon Us, That We, That We Should Be Called, Should Be Called The Sons Of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold, What Love, What Boundless Love, The Father Hath Bestowed On Sinners Lost, That We Should Be Now Called “The Sons Of God!”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No Longer Far From Him But Now By “Precious Blood” Made Nigh, Accepted In The “Well Beloved,” Near To God’s Heart We Lie.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With Such A Blessed Hope In View, We Would More Holy Be, More Like Our Risen, Glorious Lord, Whose Face We Soon Shall See.{/lang-eng}
